  • 2015

    Sparted

    JavaScript Developer (Internship)

    (jul - sept) | Charonne, France

    Sparted creates mobile games in order train employees and give them various informations about their company. KQuiz is the application developed for Kérastase. I worked on the new version of that one. I had to integrate some new interfaces as well as many new kind of games. I have done many animated interfaces with gsap. I used cordova as it was a javascript cross-platform app and mithriljs.

  • 2014

    INSHEA

    Full-Stack JavaScript Developer (Internship)

    (feb - jun) | Suresnes, France

    The french ministry of education had a project to give tablets (ipad) to CLIS (which is a school class entirely composed of students with mental or physical disability). So the ministry wanted to evaluate the efficiency of this project by working with a limited number of CLIS. So, I had to make a application that will allow teachers to give some informations about how students are dealing with the tablets they received and if they facilitate the process of learning. I developed that app alone. I made an SPA with angular. I used php with laravel on the back and mysql as database.

  • 2013

    IPEDIS

    PHP Developer (work-study contract)

    (oct - nov) | Noisy-Le-Grand, France

    I developed an application for the company whose goal was to manage the product they create. I used PHP and Jquery.

    engineering school , computer science

    (2014 - 2015) | Kremlin Bicêtre, France

We learned low level programming and many fundamental things in computer science (Programming language theory, code a compiler, c, c++, java, functional programming in haskell and lisp, object oriented programming, design patterns, analysis of algorithms, data compression and even sql with postgresql). It is by far the most difficult year of all the degree (because we have to a choose a major after that, so we won't do everything). I have learned a lot and I do appreciate that experience.
